comment: Please get well soon. Jai MahakaalJai BholenathJai ViswanathJai Shiva Shankara Pralayankara
amr:
# ::snt Please get well soon. Jai MahakaalJai BholenathJai ViswanathJai Shiva Shankara Pralayankara
(m / multi-sentence

            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG1 (y / you)

                  :ARG1 y)

      :snt2 (a / and

                        :op2 "Mahakaal"))
            :op2 (p2 / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Jai"
                        :op2 "Bholenath"))
            :op3 (p3 / person
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Jai"
                        :op2 "Vai"
                        :op3 "Vikwanath"))
            :op4 (p4 / person

                        :op3 "Pralayankara"))))
